snippet.text:
FTooltip({
  required Widget Function(BuildContext, FTooltipController) tipBuilder,
  FTooltipControl control = const .managed(),
  FTooltipStyle Function(FTooltipStyle)? style,
  AlignmentGeometry tipAnchor = .bottomCenter,
  AlignmentGeometry childAnchor = .topCenter,
  FPortalSpacing spacing = const .spacing(4),
  FPortalOverflow overflow = .flip,
  bool hover = true,
  Duration hoverEnterDuration = const Duration(milliseconds: 500),
  Duration hoverExitDuration = .zero,
  bool longPress = true,
  Duration longPressExitDuration = const Duration(milliseconds: 1500),
  Widget Function(BuildContext, FTooltipController, Widget?) builder =
      _builder,
  Widget? child,
  Key? key,
})

Core.name: Core
Core.text:
style: (style) => style,
  tipBuilder: (context, controller) => const Text('Tooltip content'),
  builder: (context, controller, child) => child!,
  child: const Text('Hover me'),

Control.name: `.lifted()`
Control.text:
control: .lifted(
    shown: false,
    onChange: (shown) {},
    motion: const FTooltipMotion(),
  ),

snippet.text:
FTooltipMotion({
  Duration entranceDuration = const Duration(milliseconds: 100),
  Duration exitDuration = const Duration(milliseconds: 100),
  Curve expandCurve = Curves.easeOutCubic,
  Curve collapseCurve = Curves.easeOutCubic,
  Curve fadeInCurve = Curves.linear,
  Curve fadeOutCurve = Curves.linear,
  Animatable<double> scaleTween = const FImmutableTween(begin: 0.93, end: 1),
  Animatable<double> fadeTween = const FImmutableTween(begin: 0, end: 1),
})

Control.name: `.managed()` with internal controller
Control.text:
control: .managed(
    initial: false,
    onChange: (shown) {},
    motion: const FTooltipMotion(),
  ),

Control.name: `.managed()` with external controller
Control.description: Uses an external controller for tooltip management.

Behavior.name: Behavior
Behavior.text:
hover: true,
  hoverEnterDuration: const Duration(milliseconds: 500),
  hoverExitDuration: .zero,
  longPress: true,
  longPressExitDuration: const Duration(milliseconds: 1500),
